name: Extreme Bus Holidays 3D
description:
Extreme Bus Holidays 3D is a brand new addition to the urban bus parking games with realistic bus transporter simulation on the asphalt city tracks to drive and drop the city passengers and tourists. Driving a modern bus simulator is a real fun for the realistic bus simulation game lovers. It is time to improve your uphill bus parking simulation skills while enjoying the furious ride of hill climb buss simulator and become the best bus driver of the 3D bus games.
GAME FEATURES
- Realistic traffic rules
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Realistic Bus sound effects
- Achievements and Leaderboards
- Easy controls (Tilt, Buttons or steering wheel)
